summary: Project involves a furniture-themed experience with a dark wooden look; user wants a more engaging background that matches furniture content and has a futuristic aesthetic.
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Make the existing dark wood background feel more futuristic and engaging while remaining furniture/interior themed; add subtle modern geometric/tech accents and lighting while keeping it dark and premium (wood-dark-bg.dim_1920x1080.png > wood-futuristic-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Update the global site background to feel more engaging and futuristic while still matching the furniture/interior theme (improve on the current dull dark-wood look) and keep all page content readable.
Wire the updated background asset into the global layout by updating SiteLayout and global CSS so the new futuristic background image is used instead of the current wood-dark-bg image.
Align the Home page hero background treatment with the new global futuristic furniture aesthetic so the hero section does not feel visually disconnected from the updated site-wide background.

new_feature_requests.summary: Revise background to be more engaging, aligned with furniture content, and have a futuristic look (improve on current dull background/dark wooden look).

projectName: Replace dull dark-wood background with an engaging futuristic furniture-themed backdrop
